column1: Floridaâ€™s total deaths linked to coronavirus reached 1,218, including the 22 in Polk. Florida had recorded 33,193 cases by this morning. Polk had 468 of them.

Deaths of an 88-year-old man and an 83-year-old woman bring Polk County to 22 COVID-19 deaths. Those two and two women whose deaths were reported Tuesday are former Highlands Lake Center residents. At least 10 from the center died of coronavirus related causes, The Ledger says.
